transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I stop at many places to let people on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often have a yellow color
📍 I follow a specific route
🏫 Many kids ride me to school

transport.question: I float on the water, but I'm not a duck. I can take you on a trip across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a kayak
⚓️ I have an anchor to stay in place
🚢 I can carry cars and people

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals, but I'm not a motorcycle. You use your legs to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I am a common mode of transport
🔔 I have a bell to warn people
🛣️ You can ride me on a bike path

transport.question: I travel on tracks, but I'm not a race car. I carry many people from city to city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I can be very long
🚦 I stop at stations
🚊 I have a conductor

transport.question: I fly high in the sky, but I'm not a bird. I can take you to faraway places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and engines
☁️ I fly above the clouds
💺 I carry passengers

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, but I'm not a disco. I rush to help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am often red
🚑 I carry people to hospital
🔥 I can help put out a fire

transport.question: I travel under the city, but I'm not a worm. I'm a fast way to get around without traffic. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I am also called a subway
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 I carry lots of people

transport.question: I am a type of boat, but very fast! I skim across the water, sometimes lifted above it. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I use a lot of power
💺 I carry people from place to place
🌊 I can go on rivers or seas

transport.question: I'm a vehicle for travelling in space, but I'm not always used for carrying people. I can launch satellites into orbit! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I burn lots of fuel to go up
🌎 I go very, very far away from Earth
🛰️ I can send pictures back from space

transport.question: I'm a type of transport that floats on water, but am powered by the wind! I use sails to move around. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ I am usually white
🧭 I can be used for fun or racing
🌬️ I need wind to move forward

plant.question: I have a face and two hands, but no arms or legs. I often tell you to enjoy the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to follow the sun
💛 I am a very cheerful flower
🌱 My seeds are often eaten by birds

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees, and turn beautiful colors in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I fall to the ground in autumn
🍁 Animals sometimes build homes in trees amongst me
🌳 I help trees make food

plant.question: I am long and orange and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
👀 I am good for your eyesight
💪 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me

plant.question: I grow underground and have eyes, but cannot see. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 People often fry me
🥣 I can be mashed
🌍 I am a popular food all around the world

plant.question: I have a trunk, but carry no clothes. I have many arms, but cannot hug. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 Animals make their homes in me
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me
🪵 I am often used to build houses

plant.question: I am a fruit that wears a crown. I am juicy and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a spiky top
🏝️ I grow in warm climates
🍹 My juice is very tasty.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk, and you can make popcorn from my kernels. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often yellow
🍿 People like to eat me at the movies
👩‍🌾 Farmers grow me in fields

plant.question: I am a climbing vine that produces a sweet, juicy fruit in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in green, red, and purple varieties
🍷 People use me to make wine
🧺 I grow in vineyards

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I store water inside and sometimes have beautiful flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can survive in very dry places
🏜️ I am often found in the American Southwest
☀️ I have thorns to protect myself

plant.question: I am a spice that comes from the bark of a tree. I am used to flavor sweet treats and have a warm, comforting scent. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I am often used in autumn baking
☕ I taste great in warm drinks
🪵 I can be ground into a powder or used as a stick
